skills.name: Shock Impact
skills.description: [SP: 10][CD: 30s] Charges forward to attack the enemy, dealing 900% ATK of Physical DMG. Wielder then recovers 4 SP per 0.5s for 8s.

skills.name: Capacitance Plus
skills.description: During Ultimate or Burst mode, ATKs gain 10.0% Total DMG Multiplier and 16.0% higher Crit Rate. Character starts with 10.0 more SP. Does not work in Open World.
